titleStmt.title: SII 8.206: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 206. (A.R. No. 609 of 1902). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SAME MANDAPA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravaṟttikaḷ śrīrācarācatevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 2 Irupattiraṇṭāvatu Iṣapanāyaṟṟu pūrvapakkiṣattu catutteciyum veḷḷikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Aṉiḻattu nāḷ nittaviṉotavaḷanāṭṭu viracoḻavaḷanāṭṭu piramateyam śrīputtūrāṉa tiripuvaṉamāteviccaruppetimaṅkalattup peruṅkuṟi makāsapaiyom nammur nilakkaṇakku Amuta
paṇṭitappiriyaṉ kaṇṭu . Iṉṉāṭṭu Āvūrkkūṟṟattu muṉṉiyūrruṭaiyaār tiruvakatticuramuṭaiyaār koyil teṟkil tirumaṭaiviḷākattu tiruñāṉacampantaṉkukaikku kukāceṣamāka pūṇṭiyuṭaiyāṉ Utaiyañceytāṉ kuṭutta piṭākai kulottuṅkacoḻanallūr viranārāyaṇavatikku meṟku Irāmatevavāykkālukku vaṭakku 6kū 2catirattu kiḻakkaṭaiya 3 mā nikki Itaṉ
teṟku 3/80 nikki Itaṉ vaṭakku 3/80 Oṉpatām taraviṉāl maṭakku 1/320 x 1/20 + 4 Iṉnilam mukkāṇiyiṉāl maṭakku nilam kiḻ Irumā varaiyum kukāceṣamāka viṭṭāṉ Eṉṟum Iṉṉilam Iṟukkapaṟṟā teṉṟum Iṉṉilam Ūrkiḻ Iṟaiyiliyāka peṟaveṇum Eṉṟum Ivvūr niyāyattārum tāṉattārum vanta pokkiṣattu mutalkaḷum Aruḷicceykaiyāle Iṉṉilam mukkāṇiyiṉāl maṭakku nilam kiḻ I
ṟaiyiliyāka niṟuttikkuṭuttu nammur 2 10 2vatu kāṇi Aṉupokam EḻutukiṟaIṭattu taramiliyāy Oḻukal māṭṭeṟintu varukiṟa kuḷaṅkaḷ Uḷḷiṭṭa taramili nilattu palaperilum taram pūṭṭi Ūrkkuṭalāṉa maṭakkile kūṭṭikkoḷḷavum . Immaṭakku Ippaṭi Ūrkkiḻ Iṟaiyiliyāka niṟutti taṉ Eḻuttāl kaiyolai Eḻuti kuṭukkakkaṭavatākavum coṉṉom . paṇiyāl Ūrkaṇakku Ālattuṭaiyāṉ cātuce
A few letters are lost at the end.
Digital edition of SII 8.206 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
